rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0001
rows.name:
Say, Rex. Do you truly believe
that Eden exists?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0002
rows.name: Do you even have to ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0003
rows.name:
Don't you, Meleph? I don't understand
why you'd even be here then!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0004
rows.name: No...that's not what I mean.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0005
rows.name:
I just wanted to clarify how
everyone truly feels.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0006
rows.name:
I'm guessing even you've heard stories 
about Eden, right Zeke?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0007
rows.name: Well, I guess so, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0008
rows.name:
Our chum here's seen the real deal
in his dreams or whatever, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0013
rows.name:
There were wide green fields and a
warm breeze, and a beautiful city
like nothing I've ever seen...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0014
rows.name:
Homura was standing on top of a hill
overlooking it all.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm sure it must have been Eden.
There's no place like it in Alst.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0009
rows.name: The place you saw in your dream...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0010
rows.name:
Is it prudent to believe in Eden
based on that information alone,
I wonder?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0012
rows.name: Don't you trust me and Homura, Meleph?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0201
rows.name: Oh no, I trust you both.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0202
rows.name:
But just because a place exists in
your dreams, does not necessarily
mean it exists in reality.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0203
rows.name:
Zeke, can you honestly say you have
never doubted Eden's existence
in the slightest?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0204
rows.name:
Well, I guess I have wondered from
time to time.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0205
rows.name:
At the end of the day, the only way
to be truly sure is to go there, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0206
rows.name: True enough.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0207
rows.name:
As for now, Rex believes it's real,
and that's enough for me.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0208
rows.name: Aww, Zeke!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0209
kizunatalk043_msg0210
rows.name:
Our chum's on a mission to help
Homura reach her dream.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0211
rows.name:
Whatever the outcome, I want to
see that through to the end.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0212
rows.name: A mission...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0213
rows.name:
So what if there's no proof?
Chasing after dreams is what real
men are born to do!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0214
rows.name: Very well. I appreciate your passion.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0215
rows.name:
Though I'm not quite sure I understand
your notion of a "real man".

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0216
rows.name:
Hey, no worries.
You'll figure it out eventually.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0217
rows.name:
I mean, you're basically the
manliest one here!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0218
rows.name:
...Zeke. There are some things in this
world you don't joke about.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0223
rows.name: Even my temper has its limits.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0219
rows.name:
Would you like me to teach you
a lesson you won't ever forget?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0220
rows.name:
Uh, Meleph?
You're scaring me a little...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0221
rows.name:
Hold it, hold it!
I was just joking around!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0224
rows.name: Hehehe...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0222
rows.name:
L-listen, nobody needs to
die here, OK? ...OK?!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0301
rows.name:
Say, Rex. Do you really think that
place is Eden?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0302
rows.name:
It's a tough sell, for sure. That barren
wasteland is nothing like the paradise
in the fairy tales...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0303
rows.name: To be honest, I'm not even sure myself.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0304
rows.name:
The Eden I saw first was a warm
place, full of sunlight and greenery.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0305
rows.name:
Do you think that Eden still
exists somewhere else?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0306
rows.name:
No... We definitely made it
to the right place.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0307
rows.name:
There was no greenery or sunlight,
but it was still the same place as
the Eden I saw.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0308
rows.name:
Then what, you think the paradise
Eden was never anything more
than a dream?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0309
rows.name: I don't think we can say that for sure.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0310
rows.name:
Perhaps what Rex saw was how
Eden truly was, long ago.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0311
rows.name: Long ago?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0312
rows.name:
Yes. A vision of an older Eden, taken
from within someone's memories.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0313
rows.name:
So our chum here was dreaming
about...someone else's memories?

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0314
rows.name: That's pretty freaky stuff.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0315
rows.name:
Yes, it's certainly far from an
ordinary phenomenon.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0317
rows.name:
If the passage of time could turn the
Eden I saw into...that...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0318
rows.name:
Maybe Alst could end up like that
too someday.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0319
rows.name:
Indeed. It is the same as the Iiran
Divine Beast we saw in Mors. All things
deteriorate, over time.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0320
rows.name:
But time isn't the threat right now.
Metsu could turn Alst into a
wasteland like that any time...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0321
rows.name: True enough...

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0322
rows.name:
And I daresay neither we humans
nor even the Divine Beasts themselves
could survive in such a world.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0323
rows.name:
That's why we have to stop him,
no matter what!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0324
rows.name: That's the spirit I like to see, chum!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0325
rows.name:
I thought you might be depressed that
Eden wasn't all you'd hoped, but
I guess I needn't have worried.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0326
rows.name:
Rex is not so weak as to let
something like this set him back.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0327
rows.name:
His strength of will is what has
carried us all this far.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0328
rows.name:
Wh-what's up with you two
all of a sudden? There's no
point flattering me, you know!

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0329
rows.name:
Don't fret, chum. You just keep doing
what you always do.

rows.label: kizunatalk043_msg0330
rows.name:
Yes...keep forging our path ahead.
We're counting on you.
